content:
<rule id="removed-javaee-modules-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
            	<javaclass references="javax.activation{*}">
            		<location>IMPORT</location>
            	</javaclass>
            </when>            
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="The java.activation (JAF) module has been removed from OpenJDK 11">
                    <message>
                        Add the `jakarta.activation` dependency to your application's `pom.xml`.

                        `<groupId>jakarta.activation</groupId>`

                        `<artifactId>jakarta.activation</artifactId>`
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/javase/11-relnote-issues.html#JDK-8190378" title="Removed Java EE modules"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
